issue.title: www.thepinknews.com
issue.body:
### Issue URL (Incorrect Blocking) [http://www.thepinknews.com](https://adguardteam.github.io/AnonymousRedirect/redirect.html?url=http%3A%2F%2Fwww.thepinknews.com) ### Comment > With AdGuard enabled, 'thepinknews.com' briefly loads for a split second and then the entire website goes blank. It happens for all webpages on the site and the issue started recently, maybe within the last couple of weeks. > > I'm seeing the issue using Safari in macOS and iOS. My Windows PC running Edge with uBlock Origin and Disconnect (no AdGuard) doesn't have this issue. > > Note that I see the same issue in Safari using Wipr 2 instead of AdGuard, so I suspect it's something to do with how Safari content blocking works. ### Screenshots
Screenshot 1 ![Screenshot 1](https://cdn.adguard.info/sitereports/pz5yfakmn3ksk8k8sscs84kso00wko0f2xzhpjuolk.png?nc=1)
